original_title: Confetti of the Mind: The Short Films of Nacho Vigolondo
overview: The definitive compilation of Nacho's most brilliant and unforgettable shorts. Collected for the first time and personally curated by Vigalondo himself and his longtime partner-in-crime , Nahikari Ipi√±a, CONFETTI features such favorites as CHOQUE, SUNDAY, MARISA, and CARLOTA, as well as a fresh introduction and thoughts by the man himself.
title: Confetti of the Mind: The Short Films of Nacho Vigolondo
